name: Adrenaline Junky: Deadly Motor Sport - Avoid Road Crash
name_original: Adrenaline Junky: Deadly Motor Sport - Avoid Road Crash
description:
Adrenaline Junky: Deadly Motor Sport - Avoid Road Crash is a racing-arcade game developed by Hitendra Pratap. It was originally released in 2014. Hitendra Pratap published the game.
Adrenaline Junky: Deadly Motor Sport - Avoid Road Crash is available on iOS.
